row.name: Account and Market
row.description: Market Orders, account balance and journal history.

row.name: Communications
row.description: Private communications such as contact lists, Eve Mail and Notifications.

row.name: CharacterSheet
row.description: Character Sheet information. Contains basic'Show Info'information along with clones, account balance, implants, attributes, skills, certificates and corporation roles.

row.name: CalendarEventAttendees
row.description: Event attendee responses. Requires UpcomingCalendarEvents to function.

row.name: CorporationSheet
row.description: Exposes basic'Show Info'information as well as Member Limit and basic division and wallet info.

row.name: MemberMedals
row.description: List of medals awarded to corporation members.

row.name: AccountBalance
row.description: Current balance of all corporation accounts.
